services.title: 360 Photo Booth
services.shortDescription: A modern platform where guests can record dynamic, slow-motion videos with a rotating camera.
services.longDescription: Our most popular service! Guests stand on a platform while a camera circles them, creating amazing slow-motion, 360-degree videos perfect for sharing on social media. It's an immersive and interactive experience that will be the highlight of your event.
qualifiers: How many hours of coverage do you need?
Is there nearby power and a 10x10 ft open space?

services.title: Magic Mirror
services.shortDescription: An interactive, full-length mirror that takes amazing selfies with fun animations.
services.longDescription: The Magic Mirror is a fun, interactive, full-length mirror that takes high-quality selfies. Guests can sign their photos and add emojis right on the screen. It's a modern twist on the classic photo booth.
qualifiers: Any custom overlay or branding on prints?
Where in the venue will it be placed?

services.title: Photo Booth Printer
services.shortDescription: Receive glossy, high-quality photo strips instantly with custom logos and designs.
services.longDescription: Get high-quality, glossy photo prints in seconds. We can customize them with your event logo or a special message. A perfect keepsake for your guests.
qualifiers: Do you want custom logos or messages on prints?
Estimated guest count?

services.title: La Hora Loca with LED Robot
services.shortDescription: An epic hour of high-energy entertainment with a giant LED robot, dancers, and CO2 jets.
services.longDescription: An unforgettable hour of high-energy fun, featuring a giant dancing LED robot, samba dancers, and tons of party props to get everyone on the dance floor.
qualifiers: What time slot should the show start and for how many minutes?
Any theme preference (carnival, urban, circus)?

services.title: Cold Sparklers
services.shortDescription: Create a stunning, safe pyrotechnic-like effect for magical moments without heat or smoke.
services.longDescription: Create a stunning, magical moment for grand entrances or first dances with our completely safe indoor sparkler fountains. They produce no smoke or heat.
qualifiers: Does the venue allow indoor cold sparks?
When will you use them (entrance, first dance)?

services.title: Dance on the Clouds
services.shortDescription: A dreamy, thick cloud effect that covers the dance floor for a fairy-tale first dance.
services.longDescription: A beautiful, low-lying cloud of dry ice that covers the dance floor, creating a dreamy 'dancing on clouds' effect for a romantic first dance.
qualifiers: Is this for first dance or another moment?
Venue approval for dry-ice effects?

services.title: Monogram Projector
services.shortDescription: Project a custom, glowing monogram of initials or designs onto the dance floor or wall.
services.longDescription: Project a beautiful, custom-designed monogram of your initials or logo onto the dance floor or a wall for an elegant, personalized touch.
qualifiers: Do you have initials/logo, or should we design it?
Preferred projection location (dance floor, wall)?

services.title: LED Screens Wall
services.shortDescription: A massive LED screen wall for vibrant visuals, animations, and a futuristic event look.
services.longDescription: Make a huge visual impact with our vibrant, seamless LED video walls, perfect for stage backdrops, dynamic visual displays, or live video feeds.
qualifiers: What content will you show (video loop, live camera, slides, logos)?
Preferred wall size or stage width to match?
Ground-stack or flown from venue truss?

services.title: Champagne Dress Hostess
services.shortDescription: Modelo de bienvenida con vestido/estación de copas para recepción o cóctel. Personalizable por temática.
services.longDescription: A glamorous hostess in a custom dress that holds dozens of champagne glasses to welcome guests. It's a unique and elegant way to start any celebration.
qualifiers: Roughly how many guests will arrive during welcome?
How long would you like the hostess to serve (e.g., 60–90 minutes)?
Shall we provide the bubbly or will the venue/caterer?
Any theme/attire to match?

services.title: Welcome Bridgerton Style
services.shortDescription: Recepción elegante con 2 modelos que guían a los invitados. Ideal para galas y bodas.
services.longDescription: Elegant performers in regency-style attire who greet and escort guests, adding a touch of class. Perfect for themed weddings and upscale galas.
qualifiers: Entry greeting, escorting to tables, or both?
Any specific color palette or wardrobe notes?

services.title: LED Tunnel & Neon Tube Installations
services.shortDescription: Túnel/escenografía modular con tubos LED, colores dinámicos y escenas.
services.longDescription: A stunning visual installation of light arches, creating a tunnel or backdrop. We are pioneers in Orlando for this type of installation. It's a guaranteed showstopper.
qualifiers: Is the tunnel for a grand entrance or a photo backdrop?
Space available (length × width) and ceiling height?
Indoor or outdoor and where are the nearest power outlets?
Static brand colors or dynamic/music-reactive looks?

services.title: Two Carnival Stilt Walkers
services.shortDescription: A pair of towering stilt walkers in vibrant carnival attire to animate your party.
services.longDescription: A pair of towering stilt walkers in vibrant carnival attire to animate your party. Great for creating a grand, festive atmosphere.
qualifiers: Will they greet guests, perform, or both?
Any costume color/theme to match?

services.title: Circus-Theme Welcome
services.shortDescription: A welcome act with circus performers like mimes, jugglers, or unicyclists.
services.longDescription: A welcome act with circus performers like mimes, jugglers, or unicyclists. It sets a fun and whimsical tone from the moment guests arrive.
qualifiers: Entry welcome vs roaming interaction?
Preferred duration (about 60 minutes)?

services.title: Brazilian Carnival + One Stilt Walker
services.shortDescription: Authentic Brazilian samba dancers (garotas) plus a towering stilt walker for a true carnival feel.
services.longDescription: Authentic Brazilian samba dancers (garotas) plus a towering stilt walker for a true carnival feel. An energetic and colorful addition to any event.
qualifiers: Do you want a mini dance show plus photos?
Time slot during the event?

services.title: Hora Loca Deluxe
services.shortDescription: The ultimate Hora Loca package with multiple performers, a stilt walker, and an LED robot.
services.longDescription: The ultimate Hora Loca package with multiple performers, a stilt walker, and an LED robot. This is the all-in-one package for an unforgettable party hour.
qualifiers: How long do you want the full show?
Any preferred character or theme?

services.title: Big-Head Characters / Extra Dancers
services.shortDescription: Larger-than-life character mascots to dance and interact with your guests during Hora Loca.
services.longDescription: Larger-than-life character mascots to dance and interact with your guests during Hora Loca. A hilarious and memorable addition to any party.
qualifiers: Which character(s) are you considering?
How many additional dancers would you like?

services.title: Snow Effect
services.shortDescription: Create a magical winter wonderland with our professional, safe, and evaporating snow machines.
services.longDescription: Create a magical winter wonderland with our professional, safe, and evaporating snow machines. Ideal for winter-themed parties and first dances.
qualifiers: What area do you want covered with snowfall?
Indoor location and ceiling height?

services.title: High-Quality Projector
services.shortDescription: Display slideshows and videos on a large screen for an emotional and personal touch.
services.longDescription: We offer high-definition projectors and screens for displaying photo slideshows, videos, or presentations. A great way to share memories with your guests.
qualifiers: Content source (USB, laptop, streaming)?
Projection surface and approximate size?
